CustomField.description: Comma separated list of services. Formula removes the first 2 characters to ensure it doesn't start with ', ' - no matter which service is the first to be true.
CustomField.formula: TRIM( RIGHT( IF(VAS_FIX2MOBIL__c=true, ', F2M', '') & IF(VAS_MAXBTB__c=true, ', Max Standard', '') & IF(VAS_MAXSPORTB__c=true, ', Max Standard + Sport', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBTB11__c=true, ', SIM 1', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBX5__c=true, ', SIM 2', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBX6__c=true, ', SIM 3', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBX7__c=true, ', SIM 4', '') & IF(VAS_DUMMY2__c=true, ', Corporate APN Bruger', '') & IF(VAS_OCMUSR__c=true, ', MS Teams Phone Mobile Bruger', '') & IF(VAS_EntitleAW__c=true, ', eSIM', '') , (LEN( IF(VAS_FIX2MOBIL__c=true, ', F2M', '') & IF(VAS_MAXBTB__c=true, ', Max Standard', '') & IF(VAS_MAXSPORTB__c=true, ', Max Standard + Sport', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBTB11__c=true, ', SIM 1', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBX5__c=true, ', SIM 2', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBX6__c=true, ', SIM 3', '') & IF(VAS_SIMBX7__c=true, ', SIM 4', '') & IF(VAS_DUMMY2__c=true, ', Corporate APN Bruger', '') & IF(VAS_OCMUSR__c=true, ', MS Teams Phone Mobile Bruger', '') & IF(VAS_EntitleAW__c=true, ', eSIM', '') ) - 2)))
CustomField.label: Services on Line
